title: Security & Privacy Guide
author: Ekobol Security Team
image_caption: Protect your business and customer data with enterprise-grade security.
intro: Ekobol takes security and privacy seriously. Learn how we protect your data, comply with regulations like GDPR, and how you can enhance your account security.
p1: Your account is protected by multiple layers of security. Follow best practices to keep it secure.
li2_text: Must include: uppercase, lowercase, numbers, symbols
li4_text: Password expiry: 90 days (optional, can be disabled)
p2: If you forget your password, request a reset link via email. Link expires in 1 hour for security.
p3: Add an extra layer of security by requiring a second verification method when logging in.
li6_text: Go to Settings → Security → Two-Factor Authentication
li8_text: Choose method: Authenticator App (recommended) or SMS
li9_text: Scan QR code with authenticator app (Google Authenticator, Authy)
li11_text: Save backup codes in a secure location
p4: If you lose access to your 2FA device:
li12_text: Use one of your backup codes
li13_text: Contact support with account verification (ID, business documents)
p5: Control active sessions and automatically log out inactive users.
li15_text: View all active sessions: Settings → Security → Active Devices
li16_text: See device type, location, IP address, last active time
li18_text: Receive email notifications for new device logins
p7: Your data is protected both in transit and at rest using industry-standard encryption.
li23_text: In transit: TLS 1.3 (HTTPS) for all data transferred
li24_text: At rest: AES-256 encryption for stored data
li25_text: Database: Encrypted backups with separate keys
li26_text: API keys: Hashed using bcrypt (never stored in plaintext)
p8: Ekobol complies with GDPR (General Data Protection Regulation) to protect EU customer data.
li27_text: Right to access: Request a copy of your data
li28_text: Right to rectification: Correct inaccurate data
li29_text: Right to erasure: Request account deletion ('right to be forgotten')
li30_text: Right to portability: Export your data in machine-readable format
li31_text: Right to object: Opt-out of marketing communications
li32_text: Go to Settings → Account → Delete Account
li35_text: After 30 days: All data permanently deleted
li36_text: Exception: Legal/tax records retained for 7 years
p10: Control who has access to your account and what they can do.
role_admin_perms: All except billing and team deletion
p11: Go to Settings → Team → Invite Member. They receive an email invitation with role assignment.
p12: Track all critical actions in your account for security and compliance.
li37_text: User logins/logouts and failed login attempts
li40_text: Permission changes and team member additions/removals
p13: Navigate to Settings → Security → Audit Logs. Filter by date, user, or event type. Logs retained for 12 months.
p14: We never store your full credit card details. Payment processing is PCI DSS compliant.
li43_text: Tokenization: Card details replaced with secure tokens
li44_text: PCI DSS Level 1: Highest payment security certification
li45_text: 3D Secure: Additional verification for card transactions
li46_text: Fraud detection: AI-powered monitoring for suspicious activity
li47_text: SSL certificates: All payment pages use HTTPS
p15: We are transparent about how we collect, use, and protect your data.
li48_text: Account data: Email, name, business info
li49_text: Usage data: Features used, pages visited (analytics)
li50_text: Customer data: Data you upload (products, orders, customer info)
li51_text: Technical data: IP address, device type, browser
p16: We never sell your data. We only share with:
li57_text: Service providers: Hosting, payment processors (under strict contracts)
li58_text: Marketplaces: When you connect your store (e.g., Trendyol, Amazon)
li59_text: Legal authorities: If required by law or court order
p17: If you discover a security vulnerability, please report it responsibly.
li61_text: Include: Detailed description, steps to reproduce, impact assessment
li62_text: Do not: Publicly disclose before we've had chance to fix
li63_text: Response time: We acknowledge within 24 hours
li64_text: Bug bounty: Rewards for valid, high-severity vulnerabilities
help_text: Have a security concern? Contact our security team immediately.
